title: Team searching for Support (Plat+)
body:
Hello there!

We are currently building up a new team in order to play Flex together and eventually Tournaments if it goes well. We already filled all positions except for Support, the members are Diamond and high Platinum or have been there last season.

Requirements: -At least Platinum in Solo/Duo Queue
-At least Gold in Flex Queue
-Working microphone + Discord/TS
-Speaking English on a decent level
-Reliable, communicative, tilt-proof

If you fulfil the things listed above, feel free to add me ingame. (IGN: böööölll)
Then we can dicuss and exchange further information, if you fit in we'll invite you for 1-2 test games and see how it goes.
Greetings ;)
